name: Greater Drag

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Str 13, Improved Drag, Power Attack, base attack bonus +6.

sections.body: You receive a +2 bonus on checks made to drag a foe. This bonus stacks with the bonus granted by Improved Drag. Whenever you drag a foe, his movement provokes attacks of opportunity from all of your allies (but not you).
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: Creatures moved by drag do not provoke attacks of opportunity.
sections.name: Normal

description: Foes that you drag are thrown out of balance.
